#include <cstdio>
#include <cassert>
#define l int 
#define gc getchar_unlocked
inline void scanint(int *x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    *x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {*x = ((*x)<<1) + ((*x)<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) *x=-(*x);
}
inline void scanintll(long long int *x)
{
    register long long int c = gc();
    *x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {*x = ((*x)<<1) + ((*x)<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) *x=-(*x);
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	assert(t<=5);
	while(t--)
	{
		l n,c=0,x=0,y=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for( l i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{

		for(l j=i+1;j<=n;j++)
		{
			x=i*j;
			y=i+j;
			if(x%y==0) c++;
		}

		}
		
		printf("%d\n",c);
	}
	return 0;
}
